data.question: What is the overpotential of MAF-X27-OH at 10.0 mA cm−2 in 1.0 M KOH solution?
How does the electrocatalytic activity of MAF-X27-OH compare to MAF-X27-Cl for the oxygen evolution reaction?
data.answer: MAF-X27-OH has drastically improved electrocatalytic activities for the oxygen evolution reaction compared to MAF-X27-Cl.

data.question: Is the chemical stability of MAF-X27-Cl in acidic and strong alkaline solutions high?
What is the role of hydroxide ligands in MAF-X27-OH according to isotope tracing experiments?
data.answer: The hydroxide ligands are involved in the OER process to provide a low-energy intraframework coupling pathway.

data.question: Does the structural transformation from MAF-X27-Cl to MAF-X27-OH occur topochemically?
What is the effect of the μ-OH− ligand on the electrocatalytic activity of MAF-X27-OH?
data.answer: The μ-OH− ligand increases the electrocatalytic activity mainly by changing the chemical reaction pathway.

data.question: Can MAF-X27-OH release all guest solvent molecules below ca. 200 °C while retaining high crystallinity?
What is the Faraday efficiency of MAF-X27-OH for OER?
Does the electrical conductivity of MAF-X27-OH contribute significantly to its OER activity?
What is the turnover frequency (TOF) of MAF-X27-OH at an overpotential of 300 mV?
Is the OER performance of MAF-X27-OH superior to that of Co(OH)2 and Co3O4 at pH = 14?
What is the durability of MAF-X27-OH in OER processes?
data.answer: MAF-X27-OH exhibits excellent durability in OER processes.

data.question: Does the surface hydroxide ligand in MAF-X27-OH accelerate the OER reaction?
What is the potential increase of MAF-X27-OH after 24 hours at 10 mA cm−2?
Can further optimization of the crystal growth and/or composite/electrode structures improve the electrochemical performances of MAF-X27-OH?
What is the role of open metal sites (OMSs) in MAF-X27-OH?
data.answer: The Co(II) OMS within MAF-X27-OH can coordinate with a terminal H2O/OH− ligand and can be further oxidized to Co(III)-OH species.

data.question: Does the modification of MAF-X27-Cl to MAF-X27-OH require the application of an electric field?
What is the effect of the intraframework coupling pathway in MAF-X27-OH on the OER process?
data.answer: The intraframework coupling pathway provides a direct participation of the μ-OH− ligand in the OER process.

data.question: Is the crystallinity of MAF-X27-OH maintained after the ion exchange process?
What is the impact of the μ-OH− ligand on the cell volume of MAF-X27-OH compared to MAF-X27-Cl?
data.answer: The cell volume is reduced by ca. 2%, which can be explained by the shorter Co–O coordination bonds.
